content: want a taller cowl work more repeats in this section row 16 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 1st st and in each st around slip_stitch into top of 1st half_double_crochet to join row 17 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in 1st st and in each st around slip_stitch into top of 1st half_double_crochet to join row 18 repeat row 16 row 19 repeat row 17 row 20 repeat row 16 row 21 repeat row 17 fasten_off weave in ends on wrong side of cowl thank you so much for making my pattern please tag me @taralovescrochet on instagram and use the hashtags #tlccrossingpathscowl and #taralovescrochet visit my instagram page here https //www instagram com/taralovescrochet/ for more patterns check out my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/tara-briggs-ravelry-store crossing paths cowl - tara briggs 4 enjoy some of the amazing versions created by my testers check them out on instagram as well @jlknits1 @pounds lisa @namaste_nay_crochet @mamankay_crochet @craftygalotte @cloud_design_crochet crossing paths cowl - tara briggs 5
